underlying_goal: Review and improve a research slide deck for clarity, structure, and visual effectiveness, based on presentation best practices.
friction_detail: The agent struggled initially to analyze the 100-page PDF, hitting API limits several times, even when attempting to use a subagent. The process required several user prompts to get started.
primary_success: Provided a detailed, high-quality critique of the slide deck based on the research-presentation skill, identifying multiple areas for improvement (jargon, weak titles, buried takeaways) and then implemented the changes.
brief_summary: The user asked for a clarity review of a slide deck. After initial friction with analyzing a large PDF, the agent provided a detailed critique with concrete suggestions. The agent then applied the user-approved edits to improve the presentation's clarity and impact.
